overview:
## Discussion

You should never need to create your own [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskMetrics] instances. If you are interested in task metrics, implement the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskDelegate/urlSession(_:task:didFinishCollecting:)] method of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskDelegate]. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] will collect task metrics for you and deliver them to this method.

# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a task metrics instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You should never need to create your own [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskMetrics] instances. If you are interested in task metrics, implement the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskDelegate/urlSession(_:task:didFinishCollecting:)] method of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTaskDelegate]. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] will collect task metrics for you and deliver them to this method.
title: init()
